subject: Scholarships and Fellowships
College Athletics
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Baseball-specific N.C.A.A. restrictions going into effect this fall will make all scholarships in the sport worth at least 25 percent of an institution’s tuition and room and board.
snippet: Baseball-specific N.C.A.A. restrictions going into effect this fall will make all scholarships in the sport worth at least 25 percent of an institution’s tuition and room and board.
